metadata.name: Sulfur Complete Recipe Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive automated scraping of all 97 recipes from sulfur.wiki.gg

cooked_consumables.name: Admiral White Extra Strong
cooked_consumables.description: Gives 400% Slow motion for 7 seconds. Gives 50% Movement speed for 7 seconds.

cooked_consumables.name: Anti-Poison Gum
cooked_consumables.description: Doesn't taste great but can be an antidote to toxins.

cooked_consumables.name: Aspic
cooked_consumables.description: Random food trapped inside jelly for all eternity.

cooked_consumables.name: Banana Bread
cooked_consumables.description: A loaf of freshly baked bread made of yeast, flour and water.

cooked_consumables.name: Banana Sulfs
cooked_consumables.description: The bacon of the banana candy world.

cooked_consumables.name: Bark Bread
cooked_consumables.description: A loaf of bread made from bark instead of flour. Filling but not very nourishing.
specialNotes: Beverages include Sports Drink, Soda, or Cactus Softdrink

cooked_consumables.name: Beef Jerky
cooked_consumables.description: Dried and seasoned protein, most commonly from mammal origin. Responsible for creating truck drivers all over the world.

cooked_consumables.name: Berry Jam
cooked_consumables.description: Berries crushed and boiled with sugar. Sweet and fruity.

cooked_consumables.name: Berry Jam (Unsweetened)
cooked_consumables.description: Berries crushed and boiled. Fruity, but not as sweet as you would expect.

cooked_consumables.name: Berry Milkshake
cooked_consumables.description: A sweet beverage made of smoothly blended milk and ice cream. This one is berry flavored.

cooked_consumables.name: Biscuits And Gravy
cooked_consumables.description: White gravy with sausage squeezed tight between two loaves of bread. Exquisite.

cooked_consumables.name: Boba Tea
cooked_consumables.description: The pumpkin spice latte of teas.

cooked_consumables.name: Bottled Water
cooked_consumables.description: A 0.5L PET Bottle of water. It's half-empty.

cooked_consumables.name: Bread
cooked_consumables.description: A loaf of freshly baked bread made of yeast, flour and water.

cooked_consumables.name: Bread Sandwich
cooked_consumables.description: Not the best thing that happened from sliced bread.

cooked_consumables.name: Broth
cooked_consumables.description: A healthy, warm and soothing broth. Salty.

cooked_consumables.name: Buddy Sandwich
cooked_consumables.description: "Are you gonna eat that?"

cooked_consumables.name: Butter
cooked_consumables.description: Cow's milk that has been churned into thick butter.

cooked_consumables.name: Butter Sandwich
cooked_consumables.description: Best thing that happened from sliced bread. Chewy and savory.

cooked_consumables.name: Buttermilk
cooked_consumables.description: A product from the leftovers of cheese production.

cooked_consumables.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
cooked_consumables.description: A stack of thick and fluffy pancakes drizzled with syrup. These pancakes have a tendency to stick to the roof of your mouth.

cooked_consumables.name: Cactus Softdrink
cooked_consumables.description: A stilldrink made with cactus and cane sugar

cooked_consumables.name: Candy Cane
cooked_consumables.description: Striped candy with a pronouced bend, for display purposes

cooked_consumables.name: Cereal
cooked_consumables.description: The crunch is so satisfying.

cooked_consumables.name: Cevapi
cooked_consumables.description: Small meat turds put inside a bread cut like a Pac-person. Onions on the side.

cooked_consumables.name: Cheese
cooked_consumables.description: Gives 15 health over 10 seconds. Very tasty on its own. Or with bread. Smelly humans love it.

cooked_consumables.name: Cheese Sandwich
cooked_consumables.description: Best thing that happened from sliced bread. Chewy and savory.

cooked_consumables.name: Cheese Tops
cooked_consumables.description: Hot and cheesy.

cooked_consumables.name: Cheeseburger
cooked_consumables.description: A sandwich consisting of fillings, usually a patty of ground meat, typically from animals, placed inside a sliced bun or bread roll
specialProperties: Health increased from 35 to 45 in version 0.9.18

cooked_consumables.name: Chocolate Milkshake
cooked_consumables.description: A sweet beverage made of smoothly blended milk and ice cream. This one is chocolate flavored.
specialProperties: Cannot use Buttermilk or Whole Milk in base recipes

cooked_consumables.name: Chocolate Mudcake
cooked_consumables.description: Has a rich chocolate taste. Usually a mix of cacao, sugar, eggs, flour and butter.

cooked_consumables.name: Chocolate Syrup
cooked_consumables.description: A thick, sugary, chocolate liquid.

cooked_consumables.name: Cordon Bleu
cooked_consumables.description: Insanely fancy western maki rolls with chicken.

cooked_consumables.name: Cotton Candy
cooked_consumables.description: Sugar with sugar that processed to be fluffy. Like one-dimensional firework for the senses.

cooked_consumables.name: Cotton Swabs
cooked_consumables.description: Practical when new. Horrible when used.

cooked_consumables.name: Cuisses De Grenouille
cooked_consumables.description: Famous dish, also known as frog legs.

cooked_consumables.name: Currywurst
cooked_consumables.description: Say auf Wiedersehen to your hunger with this sausage, fries and curry ketchup combo.

cooked_consumables.name: Dimmie
cooked_consumables.description: A single dimmie, not enough to share with your mate.

cooked_consumables.name: Dopp I Grytan
cooked_consumables.description: Bread soaked in whatever was left when you cooked ham. What a concept.
specialProperties: Requires 4x4 stove for full output - 3x3 stove only yields 1

cooked_consumables.name: Double Cheeseburger
cooked_consumables.description: A sandwich consisting of fillings, usually a patty of ground meat, typically from animals, placed inside a sliced bun or bread roll

cooked_consumables.name: Dumpling
cooked_consumables.description: A dumpling filled with some kind of paté. It's punctured.

cooked_consumables.name: Egg Toddy
cooked_consumables.description: Sugar, eggs, and booze. One of santas favorites.

cooked_consumables.name: Energy Gum
cooked_consumables.description: A gum that provides resistance to elemental damage

cooked_consumables.name: Escargot
cooked_consumables.description: Boiled snails, usually with herbs and garlic. Technically mollusks and therefore classified as seafood.

cooked_consumables.name: First Aid Kit
cooked_consumables.description: A plastic box containing instruments needed to provide basic first aid, including gauze, scissors, painkillers, and disinfectant spray.

cooked_consumables.name: Fish And Chips
cooked_consumables.description: Deep growing root, featuring animal from the deep. Both deep fried. That's deep man.

cooked_consumables.name: Fondue
cooked_consumables.description: Melted cheese dish served in a communal pot. In some human tribes has become a tradition for every occasion.

cooked_consumables.name: French Hotdog
cooked_consumables.description: The gas station classic.

cooked_consumables.name: French Toast
cooked_consumables.description: Sliced bread soaked in beaten eggs then pan fried.

cooked_consumables.name: Fried Blood Pudding
cooked_consumables.description: Fried, crispy, but juicy on the inside. Enjoyed by cattle farming humans in cold biomes.

cooked_consumables.name: Fried Mushroom
cooked_consumables.description: Tender and melt on your tongue.

cooked_consumables.name: Full English Breakfast
cooked_consumables.description: The more handsome and successful older brother of the half english breakfast.

cooked_consumables.name: Gravy
cooked_consumables.description: A white, brown, or gray standard sauce.

cooked_consumables.name: Green Tea
cooked_consumables.description: Drinking this will make you feel confident wielding a sword.

cooked_consumables.name: Green Tea Gum
cooked_consumables.description: A matcha flavoured gum, sweet and tingling for the senses. Chewing this will make you feel confident wielding a sword.

cooked_consumables.name: Grilled Cactus
cooked_consumables.description: Smokey, juicy, sweet.

cooked_consumables.name: Haggis
cooked_consumables.description: Traditional scottish eat-ception. What's not to like?

cooked_consumables.name: Hard Bread
cooked_consumables.description: Flat and dry crispbread. Rich in fiber.

cooked_consumables.name: Hardshell Taco
cooked_consumables.description: A beef taco in a hard shell

cooked_consumables.name: Health Potion
cooked_consumables.description: Gives 100 health over 5 seconds. Removes Burning. Removes Poisoned.
cooked_consumables.flavor_text: A restorative potion of sacred herbs and electrolytes. Colored red with food dye.

cooked_consumables.name: Herbal Tea
cooked_consumables.description: Plants dipped in hot water. Namaste.

cooked_consumables.name: Holy Toast
cooked_consumables.description: A toasted slice of bread is showing holy signs. Researchers call the phenomenon 'face pareidolia.'

cooked_consumables.name: Hot Pot
cooked_consumables.description: Cook while you eat? What a concept!

recipes.note: Multiple variations using combinations of mushrooms, broth, and various flesh types (Hellshrew, Dog, Human, Goblin, Craw, Shav'Wa)

cooked_consumables.name: Hot Sauce
cooked_consumables.description: A condiment made from spicy fruits and other ingredients

cooked_consumables.name: Jansson's Temptation
cooked_consumables.description: One of the few named legendary traditional foods. Soulbound to Jansson.

cooked_consumables.name: Jello
cooked_consumables.description: A nine for presentation, a four for taste, and a one for nutrition.

cooked_consumables.name: Julmust
cooked_consumables.description: The last bastion of drinks to beat a certain massive company as the main carbonated drink for Christmas related activities
special_effects: +100% Crit chance down sight for 15 seconds

recipes.note: Multiple variations with different quantities of water, sugar, Christmas Spice, solution, and soda

cooked_consumables.name: Kidney Pie
cooked_consumables.description: Freshly baked and smells of ammonia and salts. Popular among elderly people with strong accents.

cooked_consumables.name: Kidney Stone
cooked_consumables.description: Suprisingly hard. Full of salts and minerals.

cooked_consumables.name: Lackerol Cactus
cooked_consumables.description: Sweet pastilles that lack any resemblance to real-life natural flavors.

cooked_consumables.name: Leverpastej
cooked_consumables.description: A human classic liver pâté to put on sandwiches. Great with butter and pickles.

cooked_consumables.name: Liver Pâté Sandwich
cooked_consumables.description: If you're in the mood for liver - then you're in for a treat.

cooked_consumables.name: Lutfisk
cooked_consumables.description: Hyper conserved double dipped multiple times forged in corrosive liquids to become the ultimate fish.

cooked_consumables.name: Mac'n'Cheese
cooked_consumables.description: Pasta and a cheese sauce. Traditional dinner from a cardboard-box.

cooked_consumables.name: Maki
cooked_consumables.description: Made from white rice formed into rolls with seaweed and cut into cylindrical shapes.
cooked_consumables.note: Fish can be substituted with Flat Sandfish or Bottled Caviar

cooked_consumables.name: Mashed Potatoes
cooked_consumables.description: Tubers mashed up with delicious buttermilk.

cooked_consumables.name: Meat Skewer
cooked_consumables.description: Has a musky, sour smell. Seems edible.

cooked_consumables.name: Meringue
cooked_consumables.description: Crunchy. Made from egg whites and sugar

cooked_consumables.name: Mineral Water
cooked_consumables.description: A 0.5L PET Bottle containing pure spring water with trace amounts of essential minerals. It's half-empty.

cooked_consumables.name: Mochi
cooked_consumables.description: Sweet and chewy.

cooked_consumables.name: Mulled Wine
cooked_consumables.description: Preferred drink of santas everywhere.

cooked_consumables.name: Mushroom Omelette
cooked_consumables.description: Eggs and mushrooms. Ooh the texture! Great with salt.

cooked_consumables.name: Mushroom Skewer
cooked_consumables.description: Has a rich umami smell.

cooked_consumables.name: Mushroom Soup
cooked_consumables.description: Mmmm... umami!
cooked_consumables.note: Specific mushroom combinations include Rödsopp, Velvet Bell, False Sulfcap, Swing-Ding, Karl-Oskar

cooked_consumables.name: Mystery Meat
cooked_consumables.description: An easy and simple way to eat several meats at once! A human classic!

cooked_consumables.name: Nashville Hot Chicken
cooked_consumables.description: Cayenne, fried and hot. Looks really good! Should try it sometime!
cooked_consumables.note: Additional recipe variations available with different quantities producing 2-4 Nashville Hot Chicken items

cooked_consumables.name: Nigiri
cooked_consumables.description: Sliced raw fish served on top of a mount or ball of vinegared rice
cooked_consumables.note: Fish can be substituted with Flat Sandfish or Snail

cooked_consumables.name: Nuggets
cooked_consumables.description: Hot and cheesy

cooked_throwables.name: Dynamite
cooked_throwables.description: A highly explosive red stick with a fuse. Useful both in mining as well as general destruction.

cooked_throwables.name: Jar of Love
cooked_throwables.description: Charm enemies with their hearts' contents.

cooked_throwables.name: Jar of Poison
cooked_throwables.description: A mason jar that has been carefully filled with a number of nerve gas globules. Produces a deadly gas cloud on impact when thrown.

cooked_throwables.name: Pineapple Grenade
cooked_throwables.description: A defensive fragmentation grenade designed to produce a deadly smattering of shrapnel on explosion.

cooked_throwables.name: Stick Grenade
cooked_throwables.description: Once thrown, it will wait a second then explode.

specialProperties.historicalReference: Based on German WW2 hand grenades
specialProperties.cookingUse: Can be used to cook mashed potatoes

cooked_throwables.name: Sulfur Grenade
cooked_throwables.description: Improvised from tangled False Sulfcaps and bits of scrap metal, this thrown explosive sticks to surfaces before detonating.

cooked_equipment.name: Extra Lung
cooked_equipment.description: A makeshift rebreather fashioned out of someone's lung and a plastic straw.
special_properties: Previously multiple Extra Lungs could stack for extended underwater breathing

cooked_equipment.name: Springcoil Boot
cooked_equipment.description: A mountain climbing gadget that enhances jumping ability with a distinctive 'sproing' sound effect.
special_properties: Originally marketed as mountain climbing gadget
Categorized as Equipment, Footwear, and Cookable
